
\begin{tabular}{\VAR{ col_alignments }}
\hline 
\BLOCK{ for h_data in header_data }
\multicolumn{\VAR{ h_data[1] }}{c}{\VAR{ h_data[0] }}
\BLOCK{ if not loop.last } & \BLOCK{ else }\\\BLOCK{ endif }
\BLOCK{ endfor }

\hline 

\BLOCK{ for row in tabular_data }
\BLOCK{ for cell in row }
\VAR{ cell }\BLOCK{ if not loop.last } & \BLOCK{ else }\\\VAR{ "\n" }\BLOCK{ endif }
\BLOCK{ endfor }
\BLOCK{ endfor }
\hline 
\end{tabular}
